about.descripcionBienvenida: We offer innovative agricultural solutions to maximize the productivity of your crops.
about.seccion1: Vicia faba, commonly known as fava bean (also faba bean in some places), is an annual herbaceous plant species of the genus Vicia of the family Fabaceae. It has been cultivated since time immemorial for human and animal food. It is the type species of the Fabaceae family.
